Start developing your Jekyll website.

  1. install or update ruby.
  2. gem install bundle jekyll
  3. clone https://github.com/myrepo
  4. jekyll new docs --blank
  5. cd docs/
  6. Create Gemfile
bundle init
another
another

gem install rouge highlighter: rouge

  1. echo "gem 'jekyll'" >> ./Gemfile Adds jekyll as a dependency in Gemfile for ruby to build your website.
  2. bundle Creates Gemfile.lock.
  3. bundle exec jekyll serve -w Builds your website.

  4. open text editor: subl .

  5. Edit the config.yml
